text: Eadward cing gret Willelm bisceop & Swetman minne portgerefe & ealle mine buruhware on Lundene <freondlice>.

& ic kiðe eow þæt ic wille þæt Wlwold abbot at Certeseige beo his saca wurðe & his socna ofer his hagan land her binnan & ofer his agene man swa ful & swa forð swa hit anig his forgengea toforen him fyrmest heuede into þan halgan minstre on ealle þinge.
& ic nelle geþafian þæt him anig man fram hande teo anig þare gerihte þes þe he mid richte to habbene ah & ic him geunnen habbe.
